# Halfling (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |

| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | [[Aerdrie Faenya]], Angharradh, Anhur, [[Arvoreen]], [[Baervan Wildwanderer]], [[Baravar Cloakshadow]], [[Berronar Truesilver]], Chauntea, Clangeddin, [[Corellon Larethian]], [[Cyrrollalee]], [[Deep Sashelas]], Deneir, [[Dugmaren Brightmantle]], Eilistraee, Eldath, [[Flandal Steelskin]], [[Gaerdal Ironhand]], [[Garl Glittergold]], Gorm Gulthyn, Gwaeron Windstrom, Haela Brightaxe, [[Hanali Celanil]], Hathor, Horus-Re, Ilmater, Isis, [[Labelas Enoreth]], Lathander, Lliira, Lurue, Marthammor Duin, Mielikki, Milil, [[Moradin]], Mystra, Nephthys, Nobanion, Osiris, [[Rillifane Rallathil]], Segojan Earthcaller, Sehanine Moonbow, Selûne, Sharess, Sharindlar, Shiallia, Solonor Thelandira, Sune, Thard Harr, Torm, Tymora, Tyr, Valkur, Yondalla. |

**Granted Powers:** Once per day for 10 minutes, you add your Charisma modifier to your [[Climb (Skill)|Climb]], Jump, Move Silently, and Hide checks. Activating this ability is a free action.

**Halfling Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Magic Stone (Spell)|Magic Stone]]****:** Three stones gain +1 on attack rolls, deal 1d6+1 damage.

**2** **[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|Cat’s Grace]]****:** Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 minute/level.

**3** **[[Magic Vestment (Spell)|Magic Vestment]]****:** Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement/4 levels.

**4** **[[Freedom of Movement]]****:** Subject moves normally despite impediments.

**5** **[[Mage's Faithful Hound (Spell)|Mage's Faithful Hound]]****:** Phantom dog can attack, guard.

**6** **[[Move Earth (Spell)|Move Earth]]****:** Dig trenches and build walls.

**7** **[[Shadow Walk (Spell)|Shadow Walk]]****:** Step into shadow to travel rapidly.

**8** **[[Word of Recall (Spell)|Word of Recall]]****:** Teleports you back to designated place.

**9** **[[Foresight (Spell)|Foresight]]****:** “Sixth sense” warns of impending danger.
